alert.note: Alert for Christian; Macon; Moultrie; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Christian, southern Moultrie, northern Shelby and south central Macon Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 343 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moweaqua, or 14 miles northwest of Shelbyville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bethany around 355 PM CDT. Findlay around 400 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sullivan, Windsor and Allenville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Illinois.
